description: Add Amd 01 questions and answers.Amendment 01 - change in delivery date.Amendment 02 - change closing deadline and add Questions and answers document.This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-240003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA:- Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products;- Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture If product amongstneeds is containedamongPND nonableaxies belonged」
